sentence: In foreign policy and on  the international stage, he is supposed to represent the United States  of America, not his own  business interests, or any foreign state or any business privately.

Where do you stand when the President of the  United States has replaced Congress with corporate America; when the  President of the United States will consult corporate America before he  consults Congress; and when the President of the United States goes  into another country, Venezuela, bombs this country, and consults with  corporate America but does not consult with the Congress of the United  States of America?
title: Where Do You Stand
